summary.para: Contains classes that implement the functionality of navigation controls (, , and ).
Lists values that indicate item headers’ alignment in the header panel.
The Tab View centers tab items in the Header Panel.
The Tab View docks tab items to the Header Panel’s ‘end’ edge.
The Tab View docks tab items to the Header Panel’s ‘start’ edge.
Lists values that specify how the drawer behaves on opening / closing.
The drawer “pushes” the content area to become visible.
The content area moves over to make the drawer visible.
The drawer moves out over the content view to become visible.
The drawer is always visible.
A page that can show / hide a drawer panel with the application’s main navigation menu and information a user may require (for example, account information).

summary.para: Lists the combination of elements the item header shows.
Identifies header elements a tab item shows by default.
An item header shows only an icon ( or ) even if the or property is also specified.
An item header shows only text ( or ) even if the or property is also specified.
An item header shows both text ( or ) and icon ( or ).
Contains the Init method that initializes the DevExpress Navigation components.
Initializes the DevExpress Navigation components.
Lists values that specify how the and position the selected tab item header.
The selected item header is centered in the header panel.
The selected item header is shifted in the header panel to be fully visible.
Lists values that specify an element position in its container.
An element is at the bottom edge of the container.
Identifies the default element position.
An element is at the left edge of the container.
An element is at the right edge of the container.
An element is at the top edge of the container.
The header panel’s length that supports the the automatically calculated size.
Initializes a new instance with the specified absolute value in pixels.
